title: How can lifestyle affect the functioning of the respiratory and circulatory systems? - Quora

response.answer_text: Over time what you’ve done in the past catches up to you. Smoke? By 50 the lungs won’t keep you running 3 blocks. Drugs? How many drug users do you know that are still alive at 60 in complete control of mind and body? I can go on but hope you get the idea.
What a juvenile question!! Lifestyle basically affects everything in your life—tobacco use, alcohol abuse, drug abuse, obesity, risky sex!!!
